name: DaisyToo
description:
CONTROLLS:

JUMP - up key

SPRINT - Shift

Restart - R

Shoot - C

*KNOWN BUG - Sometimes the sprint/movement depletes completely, when you die the movement is restored.  

You are like the rest of them, one in the crowd. But what if things were different and you were different. 

Play as Daisy, a robot that is in the process of developing human intelligence in this fun puzzle game, to break free from the city walls and get to the other side where you can be a part of nature, a part of another world far away from your reality. Think about what you do, the world is gonna do the same to you.

The theme of duality is shown in our game through game mechanics. Your powers are there to help you but at the same time you are limited in your abilities. The world respons to your actions by mirroring them on you. If you are not careful, you just might run out of powers at all, and will simply become another victim of this world. The odds are against you, good luck!
